description.value: A CodeSystem use by NHSBSA for the reimbursement and renumeration process

definition.value: Prescriptions for products recommended by the Advisory Committee on Borderline Substances.
Prescriptions for food replacement/food supplement products available in a variety of flavours
A drug used for contraceptive purposes which is not listed in Part XVI Section 10 must be endorsed with the female symbol or equivalent
Any item prescribed for the treatment of an STI must be endorsed with FS by the prescriber in order not to attract a prescription charge
Drugs and appliances to be prescribed in certain circumstances under the NHS Pharmaceutical Services. The prescriber must endorse the prescription with the reference 'SLS'.
